import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; import Data from '../data.png'; import Ny from '../ny.png'; import Me from '../me.png'; import { DiHtml5, DiCss3, DiJavascript1, DiPython, DiReact, } from 'react-icons/di'; import { SiCsharp, SiVuedotjs } from 'react-icons/si'; import resume from '../resume.docx'; function About() { return (

Adam Florez

Web Developer

Orlando, Fl

Languages

  • HTML

  • CSS

  • JavaScript

  • Python

  • C#

Frameworks

  • React

  • Vue

Skills

  • Background in Data Analytics

  • working in a corporate environment

  • Developing systems for upper management that is used daily to improve performance of our departments

Download Resume
Originally from New York. Moved to Florida a couple years ago and went through a lot of growth in that time. I went to a trade school for IT. I got my A+ certification and my MCSA. I got a job as a self service IT Analyst. I helped customers with their computers and while I was off the phone I started learning to code on my own. I wanted to make a change toward that field and started my journey or learning. I am currently attending Fullsail University for a Bachelorâ€™s of Science in web development and design. While going to college I had been given an opportunity to be a business analyst for the service desk and fell in love with data. Making reports and building dashboards that show upper management insights that they didnâ€™t have. I want to become a web developer and create incredible data visualizations.{' '}
); } export default About;
